website_summaries.verdict: A durable garment rack perfect for buyers needing a compact product for a smaller space.
pros: Supreme organization despite its smaller size
Offers 1 hanging rod, 2 storage shelves, and 4 side hooks
Neutral light color works well with any home decor
cons: Shorter than some customers were expecting

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was gonna be difficult to assemble but actually it was quite easy even for a girl like me. Perfect size to place next to the door. Details are nice and neat. Also it is light weighted, easy to move around anywhere I like.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think, just buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely impressed with this clothing rack, there isn’t a closet in my room, there’s 2 outside of my room but it’s inconvenient for me. I also wanted to grab things that I will use for the week. I have filled it up with clothes, purses and shoes and there’s still room for more. I ordered another one for my daughters to have clothes accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Peralta

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for my home studio for props and client wardrobe pieces, and this was exactly what I was looking for. It's small enough to fit nicely in a corner without taking up too much room. Plus, I love the two shelves for extra storage items, like shoes and handbags. Had it put together in about 20 minutes. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: DWells70

customer_reviews.title: Easy hang-to-dry
customer_reviews.text: I bought several items of clothing that were washable but hang to dry. I had maybe 20" of space beside the dryer and wall and looked for something that would fit there and could be put up easily. This filled the bill. It's not very tall, but tall enough for dresses. It doesn't seem real strong, but I can't see me going over the weight limit. It's short enough I can still keep my lint waste basket in the same place. Best of all, it was SO easy to assemble. It was light enough I could lift it over the dryer and slip it in beside the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Solidly Made
customer_reviews.text: I agree - the metal construction qualifies as heavy duty. Assembly was easy and all parts fit nicely together. Once assembled the clothes rack was very solid. The leg leveling ability a plus. I am not using this as a entryway rack but in a bedroom to hold shirts, pants, and folded clothing on the shelves. It would have gotten six stars if the the unit was a little taller allowing more storage on the top shelf. Again, as described, this is an entryway rack to hold coats and shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Phillers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with instructions but I didn't need them - I'm a middle-aged woman and I put this thing together in less than 10 minutes with no tools other than the tiny wrench it came with. It's cute and will hold a lot for it's size. I chose this one over all the others because it was the only one with 4 hooks and with the leveling feet, both of which are very important for my intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: RobynB

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It’s a little shorter and smaller in general than I expected, but that’s my fault for not measuring properly. The rack is a little wobbly, but once you add a lot of clothes that’s no problem. This hold clothes for two people in our household. I’d say 25 or 30 shirts total. Very easy and quick to assemble! You don’t need any other tools other than what’s provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Solid
customer_reviews.text: While it may be shorter than I have used (it’s only about 5ft high) it is by far sturdier. There doesn’t seem to be wiggle room. The shoe shelves with a top mat are also a nice addition. The hooks are thin. There are two on each side. I am not sure how they will withstand much weight. Since I have not tested that, I cannot comment. This definitely serves my purpose which is to have my visiting son hang his clothes. I recommend the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Beware of dimensions (and other reviews ...)
customer_reviews.text: Love the item, went together easily, feels sturdy, etc. The width dimension was very important to me and I read the reviews and questions ... and here is the truth! (Needed if placed between a wall and stacked washer-dryer for instance) Built as shown in the directions and pictures, with from hook end to hook end is 29 inches. Built with hooks facing in on both sides is 27.25 inches. Built with hooks facing in and without the levelers, 26.75 inches. And don't over tighten the screws, the enamel will crack (does not really matter though). Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: CAH02445

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy not commercial
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my son’s dorm room ; light jacket hoodies shirts etc so he can wash and hang a few items that aren’t meant for a storage trunk. I purchased a “used” one however it was just an open box one. The box looked ugly but the product was great and new. Not commercial grade but certainly sturdy enough for a college dorm room unless some idiot stands on it or falls on it. Thank you Langria for your craftsmanship. It is smaller than you might think but for my purposes ideal when space is a concern.
customer_reviews.author: E. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for a small space I had open. It was easy/quick to put together. I expected this to be like other racks I've had in the past that merely have bars sliding into bars, but no. This has screws holding each piece into place. I also appreciate the plastic piece for the wire shelves. That's a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: RLCBNHH

customer_reviews.title: Great Temp Closet/privacy Screen
customer_reviews.text: I broke my femur and needed to set up a privacy area for my commode and to have clothes nearby me on first floor of house so I could take care of myself. This has worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Ok so first off I’d like to say that it is a nice and simple to assemble item. It’s smaller than I thought but that’s ok because I didn’t want anything too big. The issue I have is the price. I don’t think it’s worth $36.99. $25 ok, maybe $30.
customer_reviews.author: Red Menace

customer_reviews.title: I like this rack overall
customer_reviews.text: This is a smaller clothing rack, and that's what I was looking for, but keep this in mind if you're looking for a decently sized one. I like this rack overall, but it does seem to be a little off in the dimensions. After it was put together, the legs don't seem to square off nicely, rather are a bit slanted outwards. Sturdy enough, as long as you're not hanging heavy items.
customer_reviews.author: Ngoc-Tram

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the sturdiness of this product. It was super easy to assemble. I was concerned about it’s sturdiness based some comments, however, I saw pictures with racks holding lot more than I put on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cherrie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional - love it!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy to put together. I am using it now without the wheels but will put the wheels on next month when I move it to the garage. Ordered it as we have family in town so needed extra space to hang clothes. This is perfect. It’s very durable and sturdy. Caught my 90 lb kid hanging and swinging in it. Not advisable however I was pleased it did not wobble a bit. I like the shape of the Z base as we can put baskets and shoes. It is about 5 ft high without the wheels. Wheels will add 4 more inches or so. I want to order another for my garage for coats and ski gear. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine C. Lund

customer_reviews.title: Nice little rack.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to handle spill over from a tiny closet. It seems fairly sturdy and is holding an assortment of slacks and blouses. I would recommend this if you stay within the workload capacity it is designed for. It is nice size and strength for entryway garment rack which most likely hold a few coats, umbrella, hats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: For the price that you pay, this is a pretty sturdy and durable clothing rack. It aesthetically more pleasing to look at than the ones with wheels. I like that it has two wire racks at the bottom for your shoes or accessories. I am giving only 4 stars because after putting the clothing rack together fairly nicely - it does not evenly stand. It wobbles because one of the legs is slightly not touching the floor. (I am certain my floors are leveled, LOL) Overall a good purchase, I regret nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Handy solution to outerwear chaos
customer_reviews.text: My 2 girls and I had such a mess of shoes and coats, I couldn't take it anymore! I t sure what to expect with this rack but I am impressed. It went together really quickly and it holds all of our stuff. Very practical for our little space!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Gartee

customer_reviews.title: small and unsturdy but cute
customer_reviews.text: very wobbly, but that's to be expected. It's very small and light. very easy to put together. Make sure you measure so you have a good height estimate. it fits my needs, and I think it will hold up long term, but not amazing quality/sturdiness
customer_reviews.author: S T

customer_reviews.title: small but works
customer_reviews.text: Just so you know, this is kind of small. But it is working great in my entry hall for the grandkids coats and muddy shoes. It is a little wobbly, but that is with kids grabbing it and using it for balance and all. It is holding 14 kids coats right now ranging anywhere from hoodies to heavy winter coats.
customer_reviews.author: Spice Like Us

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for extra coat storage
customer_reviews.text: I straight up ran out of closet space, even after an intense round of Maria 'Kondo-ing' and this rack was perfect to hang my heavier winter clothes and some accessories. It is nice looking and does not take up too much space (I.E you can sort of tuck it into a corner). Excited to be more organized and have more space! The hooks and 2 shelves are nice features.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Moore

customer_reviews.title: Conventional and Compact Clothing Rack
customer_reviews.text: This clothing rack has provided me with the perfect amount storage/hanging space! It is nice and compact and took me only 20 minutes to assemble alone (18yo female). It comes with an Allen wrench to help assembly and is quite sturdy. The mats for the shelves did come bent but I wasn’t planning on using them anyways so I still highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: 18 year old proof
customer_reviews.text: Our 18 year old daughter needed more storage space and this was just the right size to be useful without taking up too much space in her room. She put it together with no problem and it holds a ton of stuff. I may order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions come in four languages (incl. English), lists all the parts, easy to follow. The rack is sturdy and can hold a lot. It fits perfectly next to my closet so it’s great for small spaces. Convenient hooks (on both sides) for scarfs or purses. Shelves are good for shoes or small boxes. Leveling feet are great for uneven surfaces. Price is great and best one I could find that would fit in my small space (under 35” wide)
customer_reviews.author: Eva Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Guest room must have
customer_reviews.text: We needed something for guests to unload their shoes and hang up a few things. Rather than have to use a closet in the guest room that is filled up with other things. Like that it came in white to match the furniture we have there.
customer_reviews.author: Aninal lover and Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this rack to hang most of my clothes due to no closet space. It’s very sturdy and durable. I love the shelves at the bottom which I used for both shoes and jeans. Now that I no longer need it as storage, it still comes in handy as a beautiful decor piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This had pretty much all I was looking for: not too wide, with shoe shelving and hooks. It’s extremely easy to assemble, and for the materials it’s quite sturdy. I’m considering buying some particle board & contact paper to make the shelves look fancier, but in all it looks good as is. Fits 6-8 pairs of shoes on the shelves, and I have about 20 clothing items on the rack but it could definitely fit more.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: It didn't hold up very well. I would say a month or two after getting it, it started to slope to one side. I only had clothes on it, nothing heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Leigh

customer_reviews.title: so easy to set up for baby/toddler clothes
customer_reviews.text: not hard to put together even if you do it wrong once then follow directions:) fits inside a closet that I haven't remodeled yet, will use in laundry room after that
customer_reviews.author: B. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful.  Compares Well with Other Small Models.
customer_reviews.text: We tried a number models and they all deliver fairly well This will hold 6-7 winter coats without failing. I would describe it as sturdy, and mobile. I prefer the shoe shelves below.
customer_reviews.author: Craig  ThomasTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Holds Up Well
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described, no issues with it so far. I put some heavy stuff on this (mainly coats) and has held up well so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: This is a little flimsy. I’d get something with thicker poles. When it’s assembled it seems like if you put a coat on it you’d break it.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive for amazing quality make sure to tighten screws!
customer_reviews.text: very easy to assemble but make sure you tighten your screws. also a personal issue don’t build with your phone close to you because i have anxiety so i shake a lot so the screw slipped from my hand and cracked my screen this has nothing to do with the product itself but i am really sad. anyways i love this clothing rack and it’s durabili and how cheap it was for the amazing quality. again make sure your phone is like 5 feet away so if you’re like me and drop the screw it wont crack your screen.
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Exactly what is shown and exactly what I needed. Not too tall or wide which is perfect. Shelves are a nice touch too.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Assembled correctly and wobbly
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks kind of cool and the shelving on the bottom is nice but it is not sturdy at all. Its very wobbly im afraid it is going to fall at any moment and because it is so wobbly its not very easy to move around if you need to because it feels so fragile. I will probably end up returning it for something better
customer_reviews.author: Luke D. Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy-duty
customer_reviews.text: While not completely unhappy with my purchase for the price, i am certain that word like “commercial” and “heavy-duty” should not be used to describe this product. it’s quite small, lightweight, and possible even “flimsy”.afain, for the price not terrible but do t expect something commercial grade.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for childrens clothing
customer_reviews.text: This is a light duty rack. Heavy coats etc will strain it. Advertise it for childrens clothes & it will do the job no problem.
customer_reviews.author: artie

customer_reviews.title: This product was well loved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product several years ago and used it in our college apartment to clean up the constant onslaught of jackets and shoes from people coming and going. As it was, it withstood years of torture and abuse from my roommates and still worked perfectly fine. For the price point, this product was wonderful and I would totally buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: kayla iazzetta

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little rack. It’s not super big but it’s perfect for those coats and jackets you wear the most. Plus you can store a few shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Liz W

customer_reviews.title: Great piece.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little standing closet. I use this in my son's room, which is small and has no closet. It keeps all of his clothes so tidy and looks great in his room. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is great for keeping your winter clothes up and shoes shown and ready to wear. Easy to put together and holds a lot of jackets and scarfs without any wobbles. Stay organized
customer_reviews.author: valerie marrone

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, sturdy and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, unlike an IKEA rack I bought of a similar style. Comes in a tiny box and has plastic shelf liners that are optional. It was smaller than anticipated. But still happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than expected.
customer_reviews.text: One of the easiest set ups I ever had! It took me like 15 minutes to have this standing. Though I do feel it's a little smaller in height and width than expected, but I should of looked at the dimensions. You definitely can't put like a trench coat on this, as it would be too long. It's more for shirts. Unless you were to forego installing the second upper shelf, then maybe. Luckily I have a closet where I can put coats.
customer_reviews.author: KamiChan!

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. I use it to hang my clothes that I can't place in the dryer, and I also use it to plan my weekly outfits. I put my bag or bags in the bottom along with my shoes and tend to hang some jewelry from the hooks! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kealey Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it... Small and compact and love the two shelves on the bottom... Hopefully it will withstand time and last a while.. great for a camper
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W*****

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I know the dimensions are included, but seriously take some time to visualize how big this thing is, because it is much smaller than I anticipated and doesn't hold much. Not hard to put together at all. Just wish it was bigger. On me, but spend a little more to get something bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Vasili Dallas

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and is holding up really well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this closet organizer to use in my bonus room. My bonus room has an oddly shaped cut out that had zero use outside of storing a few items. This organizer has allowed me to turn that space into a neatly arranged makeshift closet for my clothes. It is very sturdy and is holding up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: Love having this rack to hang my rashguards to dry. Holds around 15-20 garments. The hooks on the sides are nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty satisfied with this, although it is smaller than the product photos make it look. When I was first putting it together it felt flimsy, but after tightening the screws really well it is pretty sturdy. Definitely not "heavy duty" though.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all bad to put together for someone who is not good at that sort of thing. Once together it is made to hold abot 10 items on hangers, shoes, small boxes. I do like the hooks at the side too. Not flimsy. I would purchase another if needed
customer_reviews.author: Minara

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I like it, very easy to make and fits perfectly in a small space. Used it for my daughters room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got it as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for small living spaces and a giant wardrobe. Can't really beat the price for what you gift, but my sister loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Baker

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, sturdy, love it.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy, once it's all up, it feels quite sturdy. It resolved space issue I had at my entryway, very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Melody

customer_reviews.title: Really good for price, hard to assemble for 1 person
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived immediatly, assembly is not that hard, if you have 2 people for it. With one person it will not be as easy. Seems preety good and holds as much as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very thin and flimsy !  Not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This item is not heavy duty very thin and flimsy it broke what’s only 30 pieces Of blouses . Look for another rack stay away this is junk . Item description is in accurate
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: So far we love it. My son's room doesn't have a closet as so this is perfect for his room with hats, belts and sweatshirts.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Hall

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good clothes rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good clothes rack, can hold a lot of my clothes, let me go out to take clothes very convenient, very practical, I really like, there are two layers below to put my socks, shoes, next to my Bags, as well as hats, this design I feel very good!
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Great clothing rack
customer_reviews.text: I guess you could say I LOVE it. Easy to put together, just the right size for me, right price, seems heavy duty and strong and probably a lot more I can't think of right now. There is nothing that I don't like. I would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Using it for entry way, hanged two coats , two jackets , rain coat . Nice organizer .
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. A bit smaller than what i expected but perfect for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Yi Val

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This Garment Rack is perfect for what I needed it for. Measurements fit my closet perfectly super easy to assemble. Seems pretty durable but I don't have much on it other than some work blouses and very few light dresses. The two bottom racks are meant for shoes but I'm using it as additional storage for folded laundry.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Not much worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not any where near commercial grade. Flimsy. Wobbly. Will work for our temporary needs if we’re careful but pretty sure it will be in the landfill after that.
customer_reviews.author: Iztherelife

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This was just the what I was looking for. Very sturdy and shoes easy to put together. Fit in perfect in my small little spot. Took me at least 15 minutes to put together do glad I got this
customer_reviews.author: Kita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect touch for my laundry room!!
customer_reviews.text: We just remodeled my laundry room. We decided not to put the freezer back in that room because I wanted a place to hang items from the dryer. This was perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up - everything you need included
customer_reviews.text: Super easy 20 minute set up, and no additional tools needed other than the L shape screwdriver that comes included. It's shorter than I thought, but not a problem, still serves its intended purpose well! I highly recommend this to anyone needing a little extra closet space. It may seem flimsy when it's empty but after you add some stuff on it, the weight makes it feel much more secure. One or two of the shelves' cross rungs came a little warped but made no difference function wise, plus you can't see it after you put stuff on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: J.South

customer_reviews.title: Can't stop the wobble.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bit shorter than I expected, but I guess that's my fault for overlooking the measurements. Other than that it looks great, but no matter how many times I tighten all of the screws it still becomes super loose and wobbly within a month. It took awhile to build which I didn't mind, but I just wish it were more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Useful for organizing clothes and shoes
customer_reviews.text: It's not a very steady shelf overall but it's easy to move around and it's perfect for small apartment or some corner space. We use it as a hanger and shoe shelf outside of the closet, it really helps us organizing clothes and shoes
customer_reviews.author: Piao Ye

customer_reviews.title: Smaller But Decent Clothes Rack
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind, this is a smaller clothes rack, so it’s perfect for smaller spaces. This company has a larger model too. Be sure to check dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wisyanski

customer_reviews.title: and much more sturdy than the tall metal racks you can get at ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely held way more than expected, and much more sturdy than the tall metal racks you can get at Wal-Mart. Don't hesitate! It's a great space saver and the shelves are really nice to have, I use them for shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy that I bought this item. My husband put it together very easily. I now have things organized in a small room. It's like a mini-closet. I love the hooks on each end.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Commercial grade???
customer_reviews.text: The words heavy duty and commercial grade do not pertain to this item. Easy to assemble but not substantial enough to hold a heavy amount of clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Blake

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but short
customer_reviews.text: My fault for not reading the dimensions more closely but it is shorter than I expected. Still a great rack! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey B

customer_reviews.title: Do you need a Vale?
customer_reviews.text: I like it. it was quick to assemble. Only one issue is with a load on there it does tend to sway and lean a little to one side. Not made for a heavy coat load. But very functional.
customer_reviews.author: In My Opinon, Mr.Xray2.0

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to assemble. I took about 20 minutes, like others said. It's light, so if you're going to have clothes swinging on it, it's not the best item. But for normal use of hanging clothes and accessories, it's perfect. I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue A. Nilsson

customer_reviews.title: “Heavy Duty Commercial Grade”
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty Commercial Grade is pretty much an exaggeration. Honestly, I feel like Ikea could make the exact same thing & at a fair price which isn’t 36 dollars worth of what I paid for this on amazon. Save your money & buy something that is actually heavy duty. You get what you pay for. It’s low grade metal, so I gave it two stars. Easy to put together though.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable quality, difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Works good for my application. Plan on pounding it together with a mallet. I expected better quality but it is acceptable and for the price I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jesse j. maley

customer_reviews.title: It would look better in matte black (as opposed to glossy finish
customer_reviews.text: It would look better in matte black (as opposed to glossy finish, which this product is) and the bolts which are silver are a bit of an eyesore but I don’t really notice them.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Karl

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble just wish its bigger, could hold a pretty much clothes. Good for college student or just for small room.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. A bit pricey for my budget but very worthy. It is packed so doesn’t take a lot of space but very stylish and convenient, can hold so many things, clothes, bag, hats, and makes my room look much better. Just ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I just assembled the rack, good quality and looks beautiful. Have not used it yet so not sure about the durability but is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Vimary Shortridge

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of closet space, and so this has been perfect for hanging my day-to-day clothes. I gave 4 starts for Sturdiness, but honestly it's great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. I have purchased other Langria products and have been satisfied. I was not satisfied with this purchase. It is not heavy duty. It’s actually pretty flimsy. I am only using it to set my outfits out for the week. It’s shows the max weight limit is 66lbs. I only have a about 25lbs on it now.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it for the unique size but it's wobbly
customer_reviews.text: It's the only thing that fits in my odd shaped closet but it is wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a room I’m Airbnb-omg and it’s perfect. It’s small yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Demetria Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this garment rack! It's super sturdy and very light weight which allows me to move it around easily! It's was surprisingly easy to assemble even though it was my first time building any type of furniture! I love the 2 shelves at the bottom, can fit lots of shoes and baskets for accessories! I currently use this rack for my Lolita fashion dresses and it holds them up well! This rack is very affordable and for the price it works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: temporary closet space
customer_reviews.text: IT did not cost much, was easy to put together and serves it's purpose. It is a bit flimsy and a couple of the scres to not fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Really great rack that doesn't take up a lot of space
customer_reviews.text: Really great rack that doesn't take up a lot of space. Was disappointed that there were absolutely no instructions in the package, but I looked at the photo and easily put the few pieces together to form the wrap. Sturdy and holds a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Doria Candors

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It's cute and holds a lot. I've had it for about 5 months and I hang mostly shirts and purses and put shoes on the bottom shelves. It hasn't fallen over or had any issues. The assembling took a little bit longer than I wanted but it wasnt hard!
customer_reviews.author: Jen from Seattle

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to use and she puts all the parts together ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage daughter put it in her room to keep her clothes and shoes organized. It’s easy to use and she puts all the parts together by herself. It’s worth the money .
customer_reviews.author: Emily H

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I would like, but does the job it was meant for. Just have to be a bit careful when moving the piece or with heavier demands.
customer_reviews.author: mrahj

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Its is perfect for the small space I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Clesh

customer_reviews.title: Should've bought 2
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy, easy to assemble & looks great. Its the perfect little size for your front entry way. We bought it for dad so I will have to purchase another for home.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear2

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I got this a few months ago and really took it for granted. This rack is by far amazing. Super durable, organizable and very cute. It holds a good amount of things and really ties my room together. Obsessed is an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: Atayjah B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy. Fits in the spot I wanted it to but for some reason I thought it was bigger. A little overpriced for the size I think.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Tennison

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of it but way too short for me I can’t hang any pants on it what a bummer and I threw the box away
customer_reviews.author: kecoka

customer_reviews.title: Not white
customer_reviews.text: Showed up today, not white, but cream. When you are trying to design a room you want the color to be what the description says. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Wells

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice small rack, but I dont expect it to last too long. Material look very cheap
customer_reviews.author: rootchka

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Rack was small, slim, and flimsy in general. If this product was $10 I would give it a five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: ... but after a few months it’s still holding up nicely. Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s a tad flimsy but after a few months it’s still holding up nicely. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

product_meta.title: LANGRIA Heavy Duty Commercial Grade Clothing Garment Rack, 2-Tier Entryway Metal Coat Rack and Shoe Bench Storage Stand with Single Rod and 4 Hooks for Home Office Bedroom Max Capacity 66.1lbs, White
feature_bullets: STORAGE SOLUTIONS: roomy rack to organize your everyday clothes or seasonal outfits; it has 1 rod, 4 side hooks 2 sidebars to hang accessories such as hats, scarves or umbrellas and 2 shelves equipped with removable PP sheets for your shoes or boxes

STURDY BODY: all metal solid garment rack to hold a max load capacity of 66.1lbs; it has a powder-coated white finish which seamlessly combines with any décor, protects the unit from water and rust and offers long-lasting duration for a daily use

MODERN & SLEEK DESIGN: built with the perfect size to fit in your bedroom, hallway, bathroom and entryways (26.8 x 13.4 x 59.1 in), this industrial-like garment clothes and shoe bench keeps your garments and accessories always organized and tidy
LEVELING FEET: 4 leveling feet can be individually adjust to maintain the unit in place, well balanced and stabilized, even when it encounters uneven floors or surfaces

ASSEMBLY & CARE: Easy to assemble; an Allen wrench and a notice sheet are included in the package; when dirty, wipe it clean with a soft damp cloth; all dimensions are manually measured with a possible deviation of 1-3 cm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars955 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
